title: Death Of Super Bowl Ads? Impeachment XLV 2.9.21
itunes:title: Death Of Super Bowl Ads? Impeachment XLV 2.9.21
description:
In episode 808, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Billy Wayne Davis to discuss the Super Bowl, Trump's impeachment trial, and more.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Super Bowl 2021: TV coverage highlights and lowlights from a big game in a strange year
  2. Trump’s new lawyer didn’t just decline to prosecute Bill Cosby; he also fought his later prosecution
  3. Trump impeachment lawyer says he'll use video of Dems' own remarks at trial
  4. WATCH: Exit Music (For a Film) Radiodread Easy Star All-Stars

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
